name: Paths of Ninja
description:
Fight the enemy in a fierce battle or quietly eliminate one by one, maybe just bypass? Help the revolutionaries or side with the Empress? Lightning victory or protracted conflict. The player chooses the path of his choice from among the available ones, changing the world around you or just watching the changes, exploring ancient ruins in search of the strongest ammunition. Every decision will change the world around and the character: You can become a great General in shining armor with a sharp sword or a hidden assassin who knows ancient terrifying spells. Choose Ninjutsu and follow its path! The main things done in this version:

1.  Random generator locations where the main gameplay will take place. This version shows where on the global map these locations will be, when selecting a map for the test in the menu.

2.  Combat: damage physical and elements. Stats disabled, such as freezing, arson. stun, bleeding (because are at the stage of finalizing the effects and animation).

3.  Random things, swords, rings. the rarity of things depends on the parameters. All books give characteristics.

4.  NPS vision, hearing, sniffing. you can't run behind the backs:)

5.  Gaining exp. for actions, gaining character levels, increasing characteristics for points.

6.  Changes from the characteristics of strength gives damage, chewiness gives HP. Intelligence in development.

7.  Grades of items, sharpening of items. You can find a sharpened item or sharpen it yourself, the chance of sharpening depends on the grade. Stones for sharpening can be found on the map. Items on the map with a high chance of sharpening. 

Chances are greatly increased for the test!

The real chances and description you can get by contacting us.

8. Weapons: The sword is implemented with several models in the next version will be 97k+ swords (finalizing randomizer).
